title: League crash  my Internet...
body: League crash my internet constantly when im playing a game so the game itself crash... three days in a row that I have this issue and I don't really know how to fix it... It crash for 10 to really long times.. Can you help poor Chtullu ??

replies.body: I'm here to help!  Can you specify what you mean by crash?  Are you receiving error messages, or just losing your connection while in-game?  If it's your connection, you may want to check out our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide.  Go over each step here to make sure your network is in good shape for league!  Hope this helps.
Somehting the game just froze and I can't move my champion or do nothing or somehting its froze too but I have the screen Trying to Reconnect or something like that...
What should be the result when I type command prompt to Run As Administrator ?

Running as Admin can help rule out possibilities with permissions issues set by your PC, and not related to your issue.  Were you able to go over every step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide.  What were the results?
Seems ok right now with the DNS thing ajustement, thansk for you help Mister Poro ! Appreciate !
